channel.title: [PI] pvp causing players to crash!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, I'm back again..
And today i've been dealing with this problems where whenever 2 players attack each other, it causes the server to crash. I was wondering how I would go about fixing this, I am using the TrisidiaX source. If anyone out there has any idea on how to fix this, it would be much appreciative. Thanks!

item.title: [PI] pvp causing players to crash!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“LogicalTwink, post:5, topic:476601”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=594754.msg4189734#msg4189734 date=1356659770]

I am using the TrisidiaX source.

thats the problem right there
[/quote]

Haha I figured someone would reply with this. What source would you recommend I start off with?[/quote]
pm me

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] pvp causing players to crash!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

LogicalTwink:

No, what happens is. Sometimes when you go to equip or un equip an item, it examines it. And causes it to crash upon the examine. what class file deals with exaiming items.

Examination is Client-sided. I’ve actually removed all of the Examine options for my Client. (looks strange without them lol)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] pvp causing players to crash!
item.dc:creator: @LogicalTwink LogicalTwink
item.description:
@LogicalTwink wrote:

PvPXile:

Do you get a nullpointer or anything like that?

No, what happens is. Sometimes when you go to equip or un equip an item, it examines it. And causes it to crash upon the examine. what class file deals with exaiming items.
